alert.note: Alert for Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 7:13PM EDT until June 12 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT...COLLETON AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 713 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gardens Corner to Beaufort Marine Corps Air Station to near Old House, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Beaufort, Port Royal, Clarendon, Bennetts Point, Gardens Corner, Lemon Island, Shell Point, Burton, Calawassie Island, Old House, Laurel Bay, Dale, Sheldon, Ladys Island, and Beaufort Marine Corps Air Station. This warning includes I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 17 and 18. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
